tool_description:
Get publicly accessible information from Carousell using our Scraper API. Get Information such as Search Results, Listing Information and URL Extraction.

Supported Sites:
www.carousell.com.my, www.carousell.sg, au.carousell.com, ca.carousell.com, www.carousell.com.hk, id.carousell.com, nz.carousell.com, tw.carousell.com.
name: Carousell
title: Carousell

api_list.name: Search By URL
api_list.description:
Get Search Results from URL.
This endpoint is used for when you need highly custom filters on search,

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description:
Search Results URL.
This endpoint is used for when you need highly custom filters on search,

api_list.name: Get Product By URL
Extract URL
Search By Keyword
api_list.description: Get Search Results By Keyword and Filters.

optional_parameters.name: country
